svg.content:
<mxfile host="app.diagrams.net" modified="2023-08-04T19:25:34.235Z" agent="Mozilla/5.0 (X11; Linux x86_64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/115.0.0.0 Safari/537.36" etag="8APYL6MBQD_aPG_fX_y2" version="21.6.6" type="github"> <diagram name="Page-1" id="0ZCDs5hjo6CBm-ebSalJ"> <mxGraphModel dx="6408" dy="2454" grid="1" gridSize="10" guides="1" tooltips="1" connect="1" arrows="1" fold="1" page="1" pageScale="1" pageWidth="827" pageHeight="1169" math="0" shadow="0"> <root> <mxCell id="0" /> <mxCell id="1" parent="0" /> <mxCell id="QJiZ3qEwHYvG_C5eRPOK-33" value="" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="1250" y="-210" width="2700" height="1220" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="QJiZ3qEwHYvG_C5eRPOK-32" value="" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="-1450" y="-180" width="2460" height="1270" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="QJiZ3qEwHYvG_C5eRPOK-1" value="<div style="color: rgb(204, 204, 204); background-color: rgb(31, 31, 31); font-family: &quot;Droid Sans Mono&quot;, &quot;monospace&quot;, monospace; font-weight: normal; font-size: 22px; line-height: 24px;"><div>komanda: node -v -&gt; .nvmrc ce uzeti node verziju i upisati je u .nvmrc fajl</div><div><span style="color: #6a9955;">komanda: nvm use - ce uci u .nvmrc fajl ako postoji i setovati verziju node-a koju koristimo na tu verziju</span></div></div>" style="text;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;html=1;fontSize=24;fontStyle=1;verticalAlign=middle;align=left;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="-3130" y="410" width="100" height="40" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="QJiZ3qEwHYvG_C5eRPOK-2" value="<div style="color: rgb(204, 204, 204); background-color: rgb(31, 31, 31); font-family: &quot;Droid Sans Mono&quot;, &quot;monospace&quot;, monospace; font-weight: normal; line-height: 24px;"><div style=""><span style="color: rgb(106, 153, 85);"><font style="font-size: 21px;">Buffer je data koju donbijemo kao jedinice i nule slicno je kao slice of byte u GO</font></span></div></div>" style="text;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="-3130" y="480" width="1060" height="70" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="QJiZ3qEwHYvG_C5eRPOK-3" value="<div style="color: rgb(204, 204, 204); background-color: rgb(31, 31, 31); font-family: &quot;Droid Sans Mono&quot;, &quot;monospace&quot;, monospace; font-weight: normal; font-size: 18px; line-height: 24px;"><div><span style="color: #569cd6;">const</span><span style="color: #cccccc;"> </span><span style="color: #4ec9b0;">http</span><span style="color: #cccccc;"> </span><span style="color: #d4d4d4;">=</span><span style="color: #cccccc;"> </span><span style="color: #dcdcaa;">require</span><span style="color: #cccccc;">(</span><span style="color: #ce9178;">'http'</span><span style="color: #cccccc;">);</span></div><div><span style="color: #569cd6;">const</span><span style="color: #cccccc;"> </span><span style="color: #4ec9b0;">fs</span><span style="color: #cccccc;"> </span><span style="color: #d4d4d4;">=</span><span style="color: #cccccc;"> </span><span style="color: #dcdcaa;">require</span><span style="color: #cccccc;">(</span><span style="color: #ce9178;">'fs/promises'</span><span style="color: #cccccc;">);</span></div><br><div><span style="color: #569cd6;">const</span><span style="color: #cccccc;"> </span><span style="color: #4fc1ff;">PORT</span><span style="color: #cccccc;"> </span><span style="color: #d4d4d4;">=</span><span style="color: #cccccc;"> </span><span style="color: #b5cea8;">8000</span><span style="color: #cccccc;">;</span></div><br><div><span style="color: #569cd6;">const</span><span style="color: #cccccc;"> </span><span style="color: #4fc1ff;">server</span><span style="color: #cccccc;"> </span><span style="color: #d4d4d4;">=</span><span style="color: #cccccc;"> </span><span style="color: #4ec9b0;">http</span><span style="color: #cccccc;">.</span><span style="color: #dcdcaa;">createServer</span><span style="color: #cccccc;">(</span><span style="color: #569cd6;">async</span><span style="color: #cccccc;"> (</span><span style="color: #9cdcfe;">req</span><span style="color: #cccccc;">, </span><span style="color: #9cdcfe;">res</span><span style="color: #cccccc;">) </span><span style="color: #569cd6;">=&gt;</span><span style="color: #cccccc;"> {</span></div><div><span style="color: #cccccc;"> </span><span style="color: #569cd6;">const</span><span style="color: #cccccc;"> </span><span style="color: #4fc1ff;">contentBuffer</span><span style="color: #cccccc;"> </span><span style="color: #d4d4d4;">=</span><span style="color: #cccccc;"> </span><span style="color: #c586c0;">await</span><span style="color: #cccccc;"> </span><span style="color: #4ec9b0;">fs</span><span style="color: #cccccc;">.</span><span style="color: #dcdcaa;">readFile</span><span style="color: #cccccc;">(</span><span style="color: #9cdcfe;">__dirname</span><span style="color: #cccccc;"> </span><span style="color: #d4d4d4;">+</span><span style="color: #cccccc;"> </span><span style="color: #ce9178;">'/text.txt'</span><span style="color: #cccccc;">);</span></div><br><div><span style="color: #cccccc;"> </span><span style="color: #6a9955;">/*</span></div><div><span style="color: #6a9955;"> Buffer je data koju donbijemo kao jedinice i nule slicno je kao slice of byte u GO</span></div><div><span style="color: #6a9955;"> */</span></div><br><div><span style="color: #cccccc;"> </span><span style="color: #9cdcfe;">res</span><span style="color: #cccccc;">.</span><span style="color: #9cdcfe;">statusCode</span><span style="color: #cccccc;"> </span><span style="color: #d4d4d4;">=</span><span style="color: #cccccc;"> </span><span style="color: #b5cea8;">200</span><span style="color: #cccccc;">;</span></div><div><span style="color: #cccccc;"> </span><span style="color: #9cdcfe;">res</span><span style="color: #cccccc;">.</span><span style="color: #dcdcaa;">setHeader</span><span style="color: #cccccc;">(</span><span style="color: #ce9178;">'Content-Type'</span><span style="color: #cccccc;">, </span><span style="color: #ce9178;">'text/plain'</span><span style="color: #cccccc;">);</span></div><div><span style="color: #cccccc;"> </span><span style="color: #9cdcfe;">res</span><span style="color: #cccccc;">.</span><span style="color: #dcdcaa;">end</span><span style="color: #cccccc;">(</span><span style="color: #4fc1ff;">contentBuffer</span><span style="color: #cccccc;">.</span><span style="color: #dcdcaa;">toString</span><span style="color: #cccccc;">(</span><span style="color: #ce9178;">'utf-8'</span><span style="color: #cccccc;">));</span></div><div><span style="color: #cccccc;">});</span></div><br><div><span style="color: #4fc1ff;">server</span><span style="color: #cccccc;">.</span><span style="color: #dcdcaa;">listen</span><span style="color: #cccccc;">(</span><span style="color: #4fc1ff;">PORT</span><span style="color: #cccccc;">, () </span><span style="color: #569cd6;">=&gt;</span><span style="color: #cccccc;"> </span><span style="color: #9cdcfe;">console</span><span style="color: #cccccc;">.</span><span style="color: #dcdcaa;">log</span><span style="color: #cccccc;">(</span><span style="color: #ce9178;">'Started on port: '</span><span style="color: #cccccc;"> </span><span style="color: #d4d4d4;">+</span><span style="color: #cccccc;"> </span><span style="color: #4fc1ff;">PORT</span><span style="color: #cccccc;">));</span></div></div>" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;align=left;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="-3130" y="630" width="970" height="500" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="QJiZ3qEwHYvG_C5eRPOK-4" value="<font style="font-size: 28px;">Ovo je primer obican node http server</font>" value="Understanding Node JS Coe Concepts" style="text;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;html=1;fontSize=34;fontStyle=1;verticalAlign=middle;align=center;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="-3280" y="190" width="610" height="40" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="QJiZ3qEwHYvG_C5eRPOK-10" value="Machine code" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="QJiZ3qEwHYvG_C5eRPOK-12" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;" edge="1" parent="1" source="QJiZ3qEwHYvG_C5eRPOK-11" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="QJiZ3qEwHYvG_C5eRPOK-14" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;entryX=0.429;entryY=0;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;entryPerimeter=0;" x="-740" y="540" width="100" height="40" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="QJiZ3qEwHYvG_C5eRPOK-16" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="QJiZ3qEwHYvG_C5eRPOK-17" value="Assembly sa assemblerom pretvory assembly code u masinski" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="QJiZ3qEwHYvG_C5eRPOK-18" value="C/C++ sa&nbsp; njims imas vise kontrole oko OS i hardwarea i network cards i ostalo" style="text;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;html=1;fontSize=24;fontStyle=1;verticalAlign=middle;align=left;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="-630" y="480" width="770" height="160" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="QJiZ3qEwHYvG_C5eRPOK-19" value="C/C++ se sa "g++" compajlerom pretvori kod u Assembly language" style="text;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;html=1;fontSize=24;fontStyle=1;verticalAlign=middle;align=center;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="-1050" y="640" width="640" height="40" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="QJiZ3qEwHYvG_C5eRPOK-21" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;entryX=0;entryY=0.5;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;" edge="1" parent="1" source="QJiZ3qEwHYvG_C5eRPOK-20" target="QJiZ3qEwHYvG_C5eRPOK-10"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry"> <Array as="points"> <mxPoint x="-1270" y="1025" /> </Array> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="QJiZ3qEwHYvG_C5eRPOK-25" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;entryX=0;entryY=0;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;" edge="1" parent="1" source="QJiZ3qEwHYvG_C5eRPOK-20" target="QJiZ3qEwHYvG_C5eRPOK-24"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="-310" y="150" as="targetPoint" /> <Array as="points"> <mxPoint x="-1260" y="150" /> </Array> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="QJiZ3qEwHYvG_C5eRPOK-20" value="JavaScript Engine (V8)" style="text;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;html=1;fontSize=24;fontStyle=1;verticalAlign=middle;align=center;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="-1420" y="300" width="320" height="120" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="QJiZ3qEwHYvG_C5eRPOK-22" value="" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="-880" y="590" width="120" height="60" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="QJiZ3qEwHYvG_C5eRPOK-23" value="Title" style="text;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;html=1;fontSize=24;fontStyle=1;verticalAlign=middle;align=center;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="-870" y="600" width="100" height="40" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="QJiZ3qEwHYvG_C5eRPOK-24" value="V8 Engine<br>Pomocu V8 engina moze&nbsp; da embedujemo javascript kod i da ga runujemo kao c++<br>To znaci da mozemo kreirati javascript funkcije koje imaju c++ kod i sa V8 ih pokrenuti i radice kao c++ u pozadini" style="text;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;html=1;fontSize=24;fontStyle=1;verticalAlign=top;align=left;horizontal=1;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="-300" y="150" width="1360" height="130" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="QJiZ3qEwHYvG_C5eRPOK-29" value="NODE JS UNDER THE HOOD" style="text;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;html=1;fontSize=33;fontStyle=1;verticalAlign=middle;align=center;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="-1260" y="-130" width="400" height="40" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="QJiZ3qEwHYvG_C5eRPOK-31" value="<font style="font-size: 37px;">LIBUV</font>" style="text;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;html=1;fontSize=24;fontStyle=1;verticalAlign=middle;align=center;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="1320" y="-170" width="100" height="40" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="QJiZ3qEwHYvG_C5eRPOK-37" value="Node.js treba neki nacin da komunicira sa bazom, da moze da radi as fajlovima i OS, isto tako je jako bitno da moze da radi scaling
 tj da moze da scale-uje milione korisnika da koriste server, naravno da radi sa network requestovima sve se to u pozadini radi pomocu biblioteke Libuv.

 Libuv opis sa Node.js dokumentacije: 
-libuv is a multi-platform support library with a focus on asynchronous I/O. It was primarily developed for use by Node.js, but it's also used by Luvit, Julia, uvloop
and others.

Feature highlights:
Full-featured event loop backed by epoll, kqueue, IOCP, event ports.
2.Asynchronous DNS resolution
3.Asynchronous file and file system operations
4.File system events
5.ANSI escape code controlled TTY
6.IPC with socket sharing, using Unix domain sockets or named pipes (Windows)
7.Child processes
8.Thread pool
9.Signal handling
10.High resolution clock
11.Threading and synchronization primitives" style="text;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;fontSize=24;fontStyle=1;verticalAlign=middle;align=left;fontColor=default;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="1310" y="-70" width="1930" height="620" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> </root> </mxGraphModel> </diagram> </mxfile>

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 1px; height: 1px; padding-top: 640px; margin-left: 186px;

display: inline-block; font-size: 24px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; font-weight: bold; white-space: nowrap;
color: rgb(204, 204, 204); background-color: rgb(31, 31, 31); font-family: "Droid Sans Mono", "monospace", monospace; font-weight: normal; font-size: 22px; line-height: 24px;

div.div:
V8 Engine
Pomocu V8 engina moze da embedujemo javascript kod i da ga runujemo kao c++
To znaci da mozemo kreirati javascript funkcije koje imaju c++ kod i sa V8 ih pokrenuti i radice kao c++ u pozadini

g.text: Node.js treba neki nacin da komunicira sa bazom, da moze da radi as fajlovima i OS, isto tako je jako bitno da moze da radi scaling
tj da moze da scale-uje milione korisnika da koriste server, naravno da radi sa network requestovima sve se to u pozadini radi pomocu biblioteke Libuv.
-libuv is a multi-platform support library with a focus on asynchronous I/O. It was primarily developed for use by Node.js, but it's also used by Luvit, Julia, uvloop
Full-featured event loop backed by epoll, kqueue, IOCP, event ports.
6.IPC with socket sharing, using Unix domain sockets or named pipes (Windows)

a.text: Text is not SVG - cannot display
